name: UrPurrrfectMatch
description:
You are an angsty, single cat trying to match with a fine feline on UrPurrrfectMatch™. 

Try to find the kitty of your dreams and impress them with your paw-some sweater!

Press the different buttons on your screen to select different buttons in the game. 

Make sure to read about the different cats to find your lover cat. 

Dress up your cat with a sweater that you think your match will like to win their heart!

This was a game made in 5 days for the SIA Core Game Jam.

Art and UI: Joy

Art and Music: Katelyn

App Scene Code: Julian

Sweater Scene and Date Scene Code: Mabel
